Race types: Road • Circuit • Criterium • Time Trial • Stage • Omnium • CAMP • Nationals

Please note: Race team, travel and accommodation are covered for A Races (1st tier). For A events the team may not send a full squad; riders are selected on performance and race profile. For Nationals, support may be requested if there is a conflict and a rider can show capacity for a result. Races in bold are 2nd tier and casual if budget allows. Only riders selected for 1st and 2nd tier races are covered; if a rider participates but was not selected, they pay their own way.
